com.astrocalculator

Class AstroCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.astrocalculator.AstroCalculator

  • public class AstroCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
    Class dedicated to calculate basic astronomic information concerning Sun and Moon (e.g. sunset/sunrise time and azimuth, moonrise/moonset time, moon phase etc.)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AstroCalculator.Location
      Auxiliary class describing geographical location (latitude and longitude).
      class  AstroCalculator.MoonInfo
      Class including all information calculated by AstroCalculator related to Moon
      class  AstroCalculator.SunInfo
      Class including all information calculated by AstroCalculator related to Sun

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AstroCalculator(AstroDateTime astroDateTime, AstroCalculator.Location location)
      Constructor - allows the initialization of an object with time and location that will be used for calculations

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AstroDateTime getDateTime()
      Function returning date and time of calculator object
      AstroCalculator.Location getLocation()
      Function returning geographical location used by the calculator object
      AstroCalculator.MoonInfo getMoonInfo()
      Function calculates and returns information about moon age and illumination, moonrise/moonset time and next new/full moon phase
      AstroCalculator.SunInfo getSunInfo()
      Function calculates and returns information about sunrise/sunset (time and azimuth) and morning and evening twilight
      void setDateTime(AstroDateTime dateTime)
      Function to set/modify the date and time of calculator
      void setLocation(AstroCalculator.Location location)
      Function to set/modify the geographical location used by the calculator
